__inputs.name: GATEWAY_NAME
__inputs.label: Gateway name
__inputs.description: The name of the gateway to monitor

panels.description: Number of remaining days until license expiration.
panels.title: License expiration in days

panels.description: Number of Gateway/Kafka nodes and vclusters (include undefined one)
panels.title: Status

panels.description: Sum of requests per second from all selected pods.
panels.title: Total Requests

panels.description: Average/p90/p99 requests/responses time latency for all pods
panels.title: Total Requests Latency

panels.description: Sum of kafka throttling rates for all selected pods for all ApiKeys
panels.title: Total throttling rate

panels.description:
Increase of exchanged bytes 
Downstream is between clients & Gateway,
Upstream is between Gateway & Kafka
panels.title: Total Exchanged Bytes increase

panels.description: Sum of opened/closed connection to Kafka cluster from all selected pods
panels.title: Number of connections to Kafka created and closed (/s)

panels.description:
Sum of received requests per Kafka APIKey from all selected pods and vClusters.
Filter FETCH and PRODUCE apiKey by default.
panels.title: Requests/s / API key

panels.description: Kafka throttling rates per ApiKey from all selected pods and vCluisters
panels.title: Throttling / API key

panels.description: Sum of requests per second per vCluster from all selected pods
panels.title: Requests / vcluster

panels.description:
Increase of exchanged bytes per vcluster
Downstream is between clients & Gateway,
Upstream is between Gateway & Kafka
panels.title: Total Exchanged Bytes increase per Vcluster

panels.description:
Rate of exchanged bytes per topic
Downstream is between clients & Gateway,
Upstream is between Gateway & Kafka
panels.title: Total Exchanged Bytes increase per Topic

panels.description: Sum of requests per second per user on vCluster from all selected pods/vclusters
panels.title: Requests /  user & vcluster

panels.description: Show each pod CPU usage with total of resource CPU requests and limits for the selected pods.
panels.title: Stacked CPU Usage per pod

panels.description: Show each pod memory usage with total of resource memory requests and limits for the selected pods.
panels.title: Stacked Memory Usage per pod
